text: Need Sage Reed for Country Road campaign. Budget around $4,483, looking for 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x LinkedIn post, 3 x Twitter post. 6 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
